attributes.action: If the PM's deal fails in parliament, give the public a peoples vote.
attributes.additional_details:
Brexit was marketed in 2016 on the £350 million a week this like many other claims have proven wrong. we did not know what brexit would look like in 2016 but now we have a lot more information. 
there was wrong done on both sides but if this deal dose not get through the choice should go back to the public. leave voters voted for many different things and very few voted for a no-deal. the many different terms has lead to confusion and many vote for a different brexit.
attributes.background: If/when the PM's brexit deal fails the decision should go back the British public. in this vote 16 year olds should have a say as this affects them most, they had a say on Scottish independence. A lot has changed since the referendum new information has come out and many lies have been exposed.
